experience.title: Student Research Assistant

experience.title: Student Lab Assistant
experience.description:
Organized and took care of the Interactive Media(IM) lab and lab equipment. 
Helped students in the lab with IM courses and other needs around the lab.

experience.title: Physics Teacher Assistant (GCE A-LEVELS)
experience.description: Mentor High School Students for A-level and O-level Physics, providing feedback, answering questions, writing, and checking quizzes. (6 hours per week besides preparation time).

experience.title: Volunteer

Leading Bazaar Sales (collecting money for charity events).
